nodes.text: The Mk III flak vest from Pacnorval Defense Systems was a basic jacket.

The jacket was made with light durasteel plates under leayered ballistic fabric. The vests were designed to protect against shrapnel and heat and they offered a limited protection against direct hits. The flak vests were almost useless againsts blasters and were rarely seen outside of security forces excluding little resistance and backwater worlds.
They were common among noncombatants visiting areas where opposition forces heavily rely on mines, grenade traps, and other  explosive machines.
